plot: A father and daughter find themselves trapped in a garage with an old family secret. Will they be able to translate the cryptic notes in time to save themselves from a 60 year old Nazi plot?
title: Shelter
plot_es: A father and daughter find themselves trapped in a garage with an old family secret. Will they be able to translate the cryptic notes in time to save themselves from a 60 year old Nazi plot?
